title: Having trouble launching the game !!
body:
Hello, ive been trying to play 2 games and the same thing happened twice. I got in champ select then when the game should start it bugs and i dont get to laoding screen. i got the "failed to connect" window with the message "unable to connect to server..."
how can i fix it ??
I just got marked as a leaver for 2 games and now i lost lp and im on low priority queue ... any help please ?
Ps : I tried to launch a game with ehte practice tool and i got the same problem.

replies.body: Same here , i dont know whats wrong but yeah if i get banned from this im definitely gonna uninstall this game ^^

Im back home, i tried to launch a pratice game again and it worked... Dunno what was the bug.
So now im gonna try ranked (im in queue now but with that low priority penalty its gonna take soooo long)
I'll come back to say if it worked
tell me if it worked for you cause its still not working for me , im this close to uninstall
